Frame.Nav: Outstanding rear visibility with sloping hood.
Integrated hydraulic coupler makes changing buckets or attachments easy.
Spacious cab includes contoured command center, adjustable suspension seat, tilt steering column, sun screen, foot throttle and easy-to-read controls. ROPS version also available.
Maneuverability is enhanced by a 41 degree turning angle from center.
Limited-slip axles available for better traction and maximum push in slippery conditions.
Standard light package includes front and rear halogen floodlights.
General purpose buckets range from a heaped capacity of 1.0 yd3 to 1.44 yd3.
Curved glass in front provides outstanding visibility.
Spacious side door opens 180 degrees for easy entry to the cab.
Attachments include buckets, pallet forks, snow blades, grapple buckets and augers.
Optional auxiliary hydraulics in front power attachments.
Wide stair-style steps make entry to and exit from the cab easier.
Buckets feature bolt-on cutting edge or teeth.
Easy access to drive shaft and components.
2-bar linkage delivers high breakout forces up to 16,904 lb.
Single-lever loader controls include convenient Forward-Neutral-Reverse shuttle switch.
External rear-view mirrors provide good field of view.
Narrow widths allow D Series compact wheel loaders to work in tight spaces.
Stop/tail and buckup lights are standard.
Expansive, curved rear glass delivers superior visibility.
Durable drawbar hitch provides towing/dragging capacity.
D Series compact wheel loaders are powered by high-torque engines ranging from 53 to 71 hp (39 to 72 kW).
Filters and other service points are accessible at ground level with no tools. Fluid-level sight gauges help speed daily checks.
Rear halogen floodlights deliver excellent job-site visibility.
Easy-lift flip-up hood provides quick access to daily checkpoints.
Exclusive reflective decals improve the machines' job-site presence.
Multi-position sliding window for direct ventilation.
Easily accessible rear tie-downs help make transport easier.
Convenient fuel fill for gas tanks ranging from 23-26 gallons.
Low-profile rear counterweight includes recessed brake/reverse lights.
